User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Y-Ultimate Pulse application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

role.description: The user's role within the application (e.g., Admin, Organizer, Participant).

Event.title: Event
Event.description: Represents an event within the Y-Ultimate Pulse application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Event entity.

startTime.description: The start time of the event.

endTime.description: The end time of the event.

venueId.description: Reference to the Venue where the event is held. (Relationship: Venue 1:N Event)

organizerId.description: Reference to the User organizing the event. (Relationship: User 1:N Event)

imageUrl.description: URL of the event image stored in Firebase Storage.

Venue.title: Venue
Venue.description: Represents a venue where events are held.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Venue entity.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of the venue.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate of the venue.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user data. Path-based ownership ensures only the user can access their own document. Includes user's role for authorization.

/events/{eventId}.description: Stores event data.  The 'organizerId' field indicates the event organizer. This allows listing events and restricting update/delete operations to organizers or admins.

/venues/{venueId}.description: Stores venue data. Allows listing all venues.  Admin role can be checked to restrict creation/updates.
